Global Movies.title: The Godfather
Global Movies.description: The Godfather is a 1972 crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola, based on the 1969 novel by Mario Puzo.

Global Movies.description: Pulp Fiction is a 1994 neo-noir black comedy crime film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino.

Global Movies.description: Forrest Gump is a 1994 comedy-drama film directed by Robert Zemeckis and written by Eric Roth.

Global Movies.title: Terminator

Global Movies.title: Fight Club
Global Movies.description: Fight Club is a 1999 psychological thriller film directed by David Fincher.

Global Movies.title: La Dolce Vita
Global Movies.description: La Dolce Vita is a 1960 Italian drama film directed and co-written by Federico Fellini.

Global Movies.title: Goldfinger
Global Movies.description: Goldfinger is a 1964 spy film and the third installment in the James Bond series.

Global Movies.description: From Russia with Love is a 1963 spy film and the second in the James Bond series.

Global Movies.description: A manipulative woman and a roguish man carry on a turbulent love affair in the American south during the Civil War and Reconstruction.

Global Movies.description: Doctor Zhivago is a 1965 epic romantic drama film directed by David Lean.

Global Movies.description: War and Peace is a 1956 American-Italian war drama film directed by King Vidor.

Global Movies.description: A fairy tale adventure film about a young woman and her true love's quest to rescue her from an unwanted marriage.

However, an accident occurs on the site due to a forgotten safety issue, resulting in the unfortunate death of a welder.
